title: Spider - Novel Updates
tags: Adultery   Bisexual Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Comedic Undertone   Criminals   Crossover   Depictions of Cruelty   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Hackers   Handsome Male Lead   Lazy Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple Personalities   Near-Death Experience   Obsessive Love   Past Trauma   Personality Changes   Playful Protagonist   Police   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*xual Abuse   Shameless Protagonist   Thriller   Twisted Personality
author: Wú Yì   无射
description:
For a young man like Jason, not having a lover has never been a worry. 

But why is it that his sweethearts are always forced to die by accident!

A mafia godfather, a top-notch killer, an evil doctor, a business elite and a federal agent…

Mixed in with all kinds of men, the temptation of hope and the shadow of death fall at the same time.>
